Who is your favorite musician, band, or singer?
So, my favorite musician is Celine Dion.
I've been listening to her since I was very little.
So, every time I feel down or sad or I feel like doing anything,...
...I just listen to her music and I feel inspiration.
I love that she can speak three different languages.
And, I just feel like her music is all about love and positivity,...
I've been wanting to see her so bad in Las Vegas.
She is my dream concert, so hopefully I can go see her.
But, her music is beautiful, so I love it.
